1 An iced coffee americano .	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a granola bar .	So that would be a tall iced coffee americano and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced pumpkin spice latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Short .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That is it .	So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 I would like grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
5 Can I get a raspberry lemonade ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande raspberry lemonade . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced cinnamon dolce latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No .	So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
4 Can I have tall instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced coffee americano , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?

4 I would like a salted caramel mocha .	Sure ! So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 Erm , I would like a strawberry lemonade actually .	Sure ! So that would be a tall strawberry lemonade and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Actually , I would like grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 That would be it .	So that would be a tall iced cordusio . Is that right ?
4 Can I get grande , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 I want an iced pumpkin spice chai latte .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced salted caramel mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a vegetable sandwich , please .	So that would be a short iced salted caramel mocha and a vegetable sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a vegan wrap instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced salted caramel mocha and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
5 Oh I am sorry , but I would like a cinnamon latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short cinnamon latte and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced coffee americano ?	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink .	So that would be a grande iced coffee americano . Is that right ?
4 Can I have tall , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee americano . Is that right ?
5 May I get an iced pumpkin spice chai latte ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an orange juice , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a cheese toastie .	So that would be a tall orange juice and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
4 No , a dark chocolate bar .	Sure ! So that would be a tall orange juice and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 Can I have an iced cinnamon dolce latte , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 I want an iced cinnamon dolce latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
5 Can I have grande , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a grande strawberry lemonade . Is that right ?
4 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like a pumpkin spice latte .	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a strawberry cheesecake ?	So that would be a tall pumpkin spice latte and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 I want a chai tea latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall chai tea latte and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 I think I will switch tall with short .	Sure ! So that would be a short chai tea latte and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like an iced cinnamon dolce latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A lemon cheesecake .	So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Actually , I would like a chocolate brownie instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have a cinnamon latte ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a vegan wrap .	So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced latte macchiato , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink .	So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
5 Erm , I would like a peach iced tea actually .	Sure ! So that would be a short peach iced tea . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Let's change peach iced tea to a strawberry lemonade instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande strawberry lemonade and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Can I get a whole-grain feta sandwich ?	So that would be a grande iced coffee americano and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Let's change iced coffee americano to a cinnamon latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced cinnamon dolce latte ?	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 An egg sandwich .	So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a cheese toastie , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
5 May I have tall ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced cordusio ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a chocolate brownie , please .	So that would be a grande iced cordusio and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thank you .	So that would be a short iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced pumpkin spice latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a raspberry lemonade instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a peach iced tea ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink .	So that would be a tall peach iced tea . Is that right ?

5 On second thought , I would have an iced pumpkin spice chai latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 On second thought , I would have a cinnamon swirl instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice latte and a cinnamon swirl . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Can I get grande instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
5 I want tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Yeah , a tomato and mozzarella panini , please .	So that would be a grande lemonade and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a lemonade ?	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I am good .	So that would be a grande lemonade . Is that right ?
4 An iced latte macchiato .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
5 No , tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get an iced coffee mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That would be it .	So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced cinnamon dolce latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
4 Can I get grande instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A peach iced tea , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a vegetable sandwich , please .	So that would be a grande peach iced tea and a vegetable sandwich . Is that right ?
4 On second thought , I would have a fruit mix instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande peach iced tea and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an orange juice , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thanks .	So that would be a short orange juice . Is that right ?
4 May I get grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande orange juice . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?

4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced cinnamon dolce latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Can I get a vegan wrap ?	So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a chai tea latte , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a short chai tea latte and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a salted caramel mocha instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A strawberry lemonade .	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Can I get a lemon cheesecake , please ?	So that would be a tall strawberry lemonade and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like an iced caramel macchiato .	Which size ?
2 Short cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No .	So that would be a short iced caramel macchiato . Is that right ?
4 I think I will switch iced caramel macchiato with a peach iced tea .	Sure ! So that would be a short peach iced tea . Is that right ?
5 No , I want an iced latte macchiato .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced salted caramel mocha , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?

5 Sorry , I would like to change that to grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced salted caramel mocha and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 No , I want tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee americano and a PBJ sandwich . Is that right ?
5 May I have short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced coffee americano and a PBJ sandwich . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a tall pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Sorry , I would like to change that to grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a salted caramel mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I am good .	So that would be a short salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 Let's change salted caramel mocha to a lemonade instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short lemonade . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a bottle of water ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a tall bottle of water . Is that right ?
4 Let's change tall to short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short bottle of water . Is that right ?
5 Can I have grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande bottle of water . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A lemonade .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That is it .	So that would be a grande lemonade . Is that right ?
4 I want a soy latte .	Sure ! So that would be a grande soy latte . Is that right ?
5 No , I would like short .	Sure ! So that would be a short soy latte . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an orange juice , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a granola bar , please .	So that would be a grande orange juice and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 Can I get short instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice and a granola bar . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 No , tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Can I get an iced salted caramel mocha , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Hmm , a lemon cheesecake , please .	So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced pumpkin spice chai latte .	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a granola bar , please .	So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 I would like an orange juice .	Sure ! So that would be a grande orange juice and a granola bar . Is that right ?
5 No , I would like tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall orange juice and a granola bar . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced cinnamon dolce latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A granola bar .	So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A cinnamon latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a vegetable sandwich , please .	So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a vegetable sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I would like a chicken and pesto panini .	So that would be a tall pumpkin spice latte and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a pumpkin spice latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a granola bar , please .	So that would be a short pumpkin spice latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a salted caramel mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a yogurt parfait , please .	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
4 No , short .	Sure ! So that would be a short salted caramel mocha and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 May I get a cinnamon latte ?	Sure ! So that would be a short cinnamon latte and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an iced cinnamon dolce latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A milk chocolate bar .	So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have a soy latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a dark chocolate bar .	So that would be a tall soy latte and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 Actually , I would like a yogurt parfait instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 May I have short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short soy latte and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a strawberry lemonade , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a tall strawberry lemonade . Is that right ?
4 On second thought , I would have an iced salted caramel mocha instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
5 No , I would like short .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a lemonade .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a chocolate brownie .	So that would be a grande lemonade and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
4 Let's change grande to tall instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall lemonade and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
5 Sorry , I would like to change that to an iced cinnamon dolce latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 That would be it .	So that would be a grande iced salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 I think I will switch iced pumpkin spice latte with a chai tea latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall chai tea latte . Is that right ?
5 Let's change tall to grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande chai tea latte . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 A granola bar .	So that would be a short soy latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 No , I want tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
5 Can I have an iced cinnamon dolce latte ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A cinnamon latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That would be it .	So that would be a tall cinnamon latte . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a peach iced tea ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall peach iced tea . Is that right ?
5 Can I get a soy latte ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced caramel macchiato .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , that is it .	So that would be a grande iced caramel macchiato . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like an iced coffee mocha , please .	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a fruit mix .	So that would be a short iced coffee mocha and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
4 I want grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
5 No , I want a tomato and mozzarella panini .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 A white chocolate cheesecake , please .	So that would be a grande salted caramel mocha and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Erm , I would like an iced latte macchiato actually .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 Can I have short instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a soy latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a salted caramel brownie , please ?	So that would be a grande soy latte and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a peach iced tea .	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a yogurt parfait , please .	So that would be a short peach iced tea and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
4 May I have tall ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall peach iced tea and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 Can I get a raspberry lemonade ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 I am good .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 I am good .	So that would be a tall peach iced tea . Is that right ?
4 Can I get short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short peach iced tea . Is that right ?
5 A bottle of water .	Sure ! So that would be a short bottle of water . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have an iced coffee americano ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A raspberry cheesecake , please .	So that would be a short iced coffee americano and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced salted caramel mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a vegan wrap .	So that would be a tall iced salted caramel mocha and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 Can I get an iced caramel macchiato ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced caramel macchiato and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 No , thanks .	So that would be a short iced cordusio . Is that right ?
4 May I have grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 No , I would like tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cordusio . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like an orange juice , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thanks .	So that would be a grande orange juice . Is that right ?
4 Sorry , I would like to change that to short .	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice . Is that right ?
5 Erm , I would like tall actually .	Sure ! So that would be a tall orange juice . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like a strawberry lemonade .	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , an egg sandwich .	So that would be a grande strawberry lemonade and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Let's change egg sandwich to a yogurt parfait instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande strawberry lemonade and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a salted caramel mocha .	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 No , I would like a soy latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte . Is that right ?
5 Can I have an iced caramel macchiato , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced caramel macchiato . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get an iced latte macchiato ?	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That would be it .	So that would be a short iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
4 I think I will switch short with grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
5 No , I would like an iced coffee mocha .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get an iced pumpkin spice chai latte ?	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?

5 Can I have tall , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall chai tea latte and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Actually , I would like a bottle of water instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short bottle of water . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 That is it .	So that would be a grande iced coffee americano . Is that right ?
4 May I have an iced salted caramel mocha ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get an iced pumpkin spice chai latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a chicken and pesto panini .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 Can I get grande instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced cordusio ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a lemon cheesecake .	So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Can I have grande , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 I would like an iced pumpkin spice latte .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced latte macchiato , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , that is it .	So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?

1 May I have an orange juice ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a salted caramel brownie .	So that would be a tall orange juice and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
4 On second thought , I would have short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
5 Sorry , I would like to change that to grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande orange juice and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Can I get grande instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Yeah , a milk chocolate bar , please .	So that would be a short iced coffee americano and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a soy latte , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a short soy latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 I think I will switch short with tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a salted caramel mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a cheese toastie ?	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a cinnamon latte ?	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a short cinnamon latte . Is that right ?
4 No , I want an iced pumpkin spice chai latte .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
5 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An orange juice , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A raspberry cheesecake , please .	So that would be a grande orange juice and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Let's change raspberry cheesecake to a tomato and mozzarella panini instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande orange juice and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
5 Actually , I would like short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Can I have short instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Hmm , a fruit mix .	So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get an iced latte macchiato , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
4 No , tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced latte macchiato , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a chicken and pesto panini , please ?	So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?

5 Hmm , can I change to tall instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That would be it .	So that would be a short pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a soy latte ?	Sure ! So that would be a short soy latte . Is that right ?
5 On second thought , I would have a strawberry lemonade instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short strawberry lemonade . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced cordusio ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I would like a chicken and pesto panini , please .	So that would be a short iced cordusio and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 Let's change iced cordusio to an iced latte macchiato instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
5 Can I have a white chocolate cheesecake ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a fruit mix .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

2 Grande , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?

6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Can I get a raspberry lemonade ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande raspberry lemonade . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Let's change chocolate brownie to a dark chocolate bar instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 May I get an iced cordusio ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a granola bar . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Could I get a salted caramel brownie ?	So that would be a grande iced salted caramel mocha and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A bottle of water .	Which size ?
2 Grande , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get an egg sandwich , please ?	So that would be a grande bottle of water and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced latte macchiato ?	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A white chocolate cheesecake .	So that would be a short iced latte macchiato and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced coffee mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I am good .	So that would be a short iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
4 Sorry , I would like to change that to tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
5 On second thought , I would have grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a strawberry lemonade ?	Which size ?
2 Short cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A vegan wrap .	So that would be a short strawberry lemonade and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a pumpkin spice latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 May I get a milk chocolate bar ?	So that would be a grande pumpkin spice latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 Can I have tall ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall pumpkin spice latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 Can I have short instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short pumpkin spice latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Hmm , can I change to an orange juice instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall orange juice and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Can I get a chicken and pesto panini ?	So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Let's change tall to grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande soy latte . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Yes , a yogurt parfait .	So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
4 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced pumpkin spice chai latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , that is it .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have a chai tea latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink .	So that would be a tall chai tea latte . Is that right ?
4 Hmm , can I change to an iced coffee mocha instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an iced cordusio , please .	Which size ?
2 Short .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a salted caramel brownie .	So that would be a short iced cordusio and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like a raspberry lemonade instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short raspberry lemonade and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
5 Let's change salted caramel brownie to a granola bar instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short raspberry lemonade and a granola bar . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Can I have an orange juice instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall orange juice . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 I would like a raspberry cheesecake .	So that would be a short iced caramel macchiato and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced latte macchiato , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a chicken and pesto panini , please ?	So that would be a short iced latte macchiato and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 Can I get grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced latte macchiato and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
5 Can I get an iced caramel macchiato , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced caramel macchiato and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a peach iced tea , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , that is it .	So that would be a grande peach iced tea . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a raspberry lemonade ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a white chocolate cheesecake ?	So that would be a grande raspberry lemonade and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Sorry , I would like to change that to an iced caramel macchiato .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced caramel macchiato and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced caramel macchiato .	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I am good .	So that would be a short iced caramel macchiato . Is that right ?
4 Erm , I would like an iced latte macchiato actually .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an iced pumpkin spice chai latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A milk chocolate bar .	So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 Hmm , can I change to a raspberry lemonade instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short raspberry lemonade and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 I think I will switch raspberry lemonade with an iced cinnamon dolce latte .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Can I get a tomato and mozzarella panini ?	So that would be a short pumpkin spice latte and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
4 Let's change pumpkin spice latte to an orange juice instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a salted caramel mocha , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A cheese toastie , please .	So that would be a short salted caramel mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
4 Erm , I would like tall actually .	Sure ! So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
5 Oh I am sorry , but I would like grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande salted caramel mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 I want a lemon cheesecake .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 No , I want a soy latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 No .	So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
4 Erm , I would like an orange juice actually .	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced cinnamon dolce latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a white chocolate cheesecake , please .	So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Can I get tall , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 I think I will switch iced cinnamon dolce latte with a lemonade .	Sure ! So that would be a tall lemonade and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a strawberry lemonade , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Can I get a raspberry cheesecake ?	So that would be a tall strawberry lemonade and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 May I have a bottle of water ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall bottle of water and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 I am good .	So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a salted caramel mocha , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 An egg sandwich .	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a cinnamon latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a strawberry cheesecake , please .	So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 I want an iced caramel macchiato .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced caramel macchiato and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an iced coffee mocha , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a vegan wrap , please .	So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a yogurt parfait ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Can I get an iced cinnamon dolce latte instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Could I get a white chocolate cheesecake , please ?	So that would be a tall bottle of water and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Can I get grande instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande bottle of water and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get an iced pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 I want a cinnamon latte .	Sure ! So that would be a grande cinnamon latte . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a lemon cheesecake .	So that would be a tall pumpkin spice latte and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 No , an iced coffee mocha .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha and a lemon cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 No , a whole-grain feta sandwich .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced pumpkin spice chai latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thanks .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like an iced pumpkin spice latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced pumpkin spice latte .	Which size ?
2 Short , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A chicken and pesto panini , please .	So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice latte and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 Let's change short to tall instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
5 On second thought , I would have a white chocolate cheesecake instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 No , grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Erm , I would like grande actually .	Sure ! So that would be a grande bottle of water . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 I would like a cinnamon latte .	Sure ! So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 May I get a cinnamon swirl ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a cinnamon swirl . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 On second thought , I would have a milk chocolate bar instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Hmm , can I change to an orange juice instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande orange juice . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
4 I want grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
5 Erm , I would like an iced pumpkin spice chai latte actually .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have a soy latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a whole-grain feta sandwich .	So that would be a grande soy latte and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
4 No , I would like a peach iced tea .	Sure ! So that would be a grande peach iced tea and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
5 Can I have a strawberry cheesecake ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande peach iced tea and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced coffee mocha , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 May I get a raspberry cheesecake ?	So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a strawberry cheesecake , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get an iced cordusio , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall iced cordusio . Is that right ?
4 On second thought , I would have short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A strawberry lemonade .	Which size ?

1 Can I get a raspberry lemonade , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a chocolate brownie , please .	So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?

5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have an iced coffee mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 May I get an egg sandwich ?	So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a PBJ sandwich instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and a PBJ sandwich . Is that right ?
5 I think I will switch PBJ sandwich with a cheese toastie .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced coffee mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thanks .	So that would be a tall iced coffee americano . Is that right ?
4 Let's change iced coffee americano to a raspberry lemonade instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 That is it .	So that would be a tall lemonade . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced salted caramel mocha , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink .	So that would be a tall iced salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get an iced pumpkin spice latte ?	Which size ?
2 Short .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I would like a vegan wrap , please .	So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice latte and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced pumpkin spice latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No .	So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Let's change iced pumpkin spice latte to an iced cordusio instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 I would like grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced pumpkin spice chai latte , please ?	Which size ?

4 Short .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
5 No , I would like grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a salted caramel mocha , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 I think I will switch salted caramel mocha with a cinnamon latte .	Sure ! So that would be a tall cinnamon latte . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced pumpkin spice latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a chocolate brownie .	So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a vegan wrap instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
5 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a soy latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No .	So that would be a grande soy latte . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short soy latte . Is that right ?
5 Can I have tall instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall soy latte . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Can I have an iced pumpkin spice latte , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced pumpkin spice latte and a cinnamon swirl . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Can I have a peach iced tea instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall peach iced tea . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 May I get grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 May I get short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte . Is that right ?
6 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Hmm , a cheese toastie , please .	So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
4 Can I get an iced cinnamon dolce latte , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
5 Can I have a granola bar instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cinnamon dolce latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get an orange juice ?	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That would be it .	So that would be a grande orange juice . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a peach iced tea instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande peach iced tea . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have a strawberry lemonade ?	Which size ?
2 Grande .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I would like a whole-grain feta sandwich , please .	So that would be a grande strawberry lemonade and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
4 An iced cinnamon dolce latte .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
5 A raspberry cheesecake .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an orange juice , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?

4 I would like short .	Sure ! So that would be a short orange juice . Is that right ?
5 Can I have an iced latte macchiato ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Hmm , can I change to an iced cordusio instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 Can I get short instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cordusio . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Ah yes , a granola bar .	So that would be a grande iced salted caramel mocha and a granola bar . Is that right ?
4 May I have short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced salted caramel mocha and a granola bar . Is that right ?
5 Oh I am sorry , but I would like a cheese toastie instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short iced salted caramel mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like an iced coffee americano .	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No .	So that would be a tall iced coffee americano . Is that right ?
4 An iced cordusio .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced cordusio . Is that right ?
5 Can I get grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio . Is that right ?
6 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 No , I want grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
5 Can I get a lemonade , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande lemonade . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 I am good .	So that would be a tall pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Short .	Sure ! So that would be a short pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have a peach iced tea , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That is it .	So that would be a tall peach iced tea . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced pumpkin spice chai latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thanks .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
4 No , I want grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a lemonade , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A raspberry cheesecake .	So that would be a tall lemonade and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like a cheese toastie instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall lemonade and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
5 I want a bottle of water .	Sure ! So that would be a tall bottle of water and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get a lemonade ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a tall lemonade . Is that right ?
4 Can I have short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short lemonade . Is that right ?
5 May I get grande ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande lemonade . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced caramel macchiato ?	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , an egg sandwich , please .	So that would be a grande iced caramel macchiato and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Actually , I would like an iced pumpkin spice latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have a lemonade , please ?	Which size ?

1 Could I have a chai tea latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a yogurt parfait .	So that would be a tall chai tea latte and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
4 On second thought , I would have short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short chai tea latte and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 Let's change short to grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande chai tea latte and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 No , I would like grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Ah yes , a chocolate brownie .	So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
4 I want a milk chocolate bar .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 Actually , I would like grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice latte and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an orange juice ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , an egg sandwich .	So that would be a short orange juice and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I would like a chai tea latte .	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A white chocolate cheesecake , please .	So that would be a tall chai tea latte and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a chai tea latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a white chocolate cheesecake ?	So that would be a tall chai tea latte and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Erm , I would like a granola bar actually .	Sure ! So that would be a tall chai tea latte and a granola bar . Is that right ?
5 On second thought , I would have an iced latte macchiato instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato and a granola bar . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get an iced cordusio ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yeah , a whole-grain feta sandwich , please .	So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
4 Can I have short ?	Sure ! So that would be a short iced cordusio and a whole-grain feta sandwich . Is that right ?
5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Can I get a cheese toastie , please ?	So that would be a short peach iced tea and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
4 I would like tall .	Sure ! So that would be a tall peach iced tea and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
5 Actually , I would like a salted caramel mocha instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 An iced cordusio , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a tomato and mozzarella panini .	So that would be a tall iced cordusio and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
4 Can I get a raspberry lemonade ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a strawberry lemonade , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I would like a salted caramel brownie , please .	So that would be a grande strawberry lemonade and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
4 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a salted caramel mocha , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thank you .	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like a chai tea latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall chai tea latte . Is that right ?
5 No , I want grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande chai tea latte . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an iced pumpkin spice chai latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a cheese toastie .	So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
4 Can I have a cinnamon swirl ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced pumpkin spice chai latte and a cinnamon swirl . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Ah yes , a chicken and pesto panini .	So that would be a grande lemonade and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
4 Actually , I would like a raspberry lemonade instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande raspberry lemonade and a chicken and pesto panini . Is that right ?
5 May I have a cheese toastie ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande raspberry lemonade and a cheese toastie . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I have a soy latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a tomato and mozzarella panini , please ?	So that would be a tall soy latte and a tomato and mozzarella panini . Is that right ?
4 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an iced latte macchiato .	Which size ?
2 Tall cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That is it .	So that would be a tall iced latte macchiato . Is that right ?
4 On second thought , I would have an iced coffee mocha instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced coffee mocha . Is that right ?
5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 That would be it .	So that would be a short chai tea latte . Is that right ?
4 Let's change short to grande instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande chai tea latte . Is that right ?
5 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I have an orange juice , please ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Yes , a milk chocolate bar .	So that would be a tall orange juice and a milk chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I have an iced caramel macchiato ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a tall iced caramel macchiato . Is that right ?
4 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a cinnamon latte .	Which size ?
2 Grande cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 A chocolate brownie , please .	So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a chocolate brownie . Is that right ?
4 May I have an egg sandwich ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and an egg sandwich . Is that right ?
5 Let's change egg sandwich to a salted caramel brownie instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande cinnamon latte and a salted caramel brownie . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a cinnamon latte , please .	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a dark chocolate bar , please .	So that would be a tall cinnamon latte and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
4 Oh I am sorry , but I would like an iced pumpkin spice latte instead .	Sure ! So that would be a tall iced pumpkin spice latte and a dark chocolate bar . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A pumpkin spice latte , please .	Which size ?

5 I want grande .	Sure ! So that would be a grande pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want an iced pumpkin spice latte , please .	Which size ?

6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get an iced caramel macchiato , please ?	Which size ?
2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Hmm , a vegan wrap , please .	So that would be a grande iced caramel macchiato and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
4 I think I will switch iced caramel macchiato with an iced cordusio .	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio and a vegan wrap . Is that right ?
5 May I get a white chocolate cheesecake ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cordusio and a white chocolate cheesecake . Is that right ?
6 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 Can I get a strawberry cheesecake ?	So that would be a short iced cinnamon dolce latte and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Can I have grande , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a grande iced cinnamon dolce latte and a strawberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
5 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a peach iced tea ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 I would like a raspberry cheesecake , please .	So that would be a tall peach iced tea and a raspberry cheesecake . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 May I get a cinnamon latte ?	Which size ?
2 Tall , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a cinnamon swirl ?	So that would be a tall cinnamon latte and a cinnamon swirl . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Could I get a chai tea latte , please ?	Which size ?
2 Short , thank you !	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink , please .	So that would be a short chai tea latte . Is that right ?
4 Erm , I would like tall actually .	Sure ! So that would be a tall chai tea latte . Is that right ?
5 No , a raspberry lemonade .	Sure ! So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade . Is that right ?
6 Definitely .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a raspberry lemonade , please .	Which size ?
2 Short cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Ah yes , a yogurt parfait , please .	So that would be a short raspberry lemonade and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
4 Can I get tall instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a tall raspberry lemonade and a yogurt parfait . Is that right ?
5 That is correct .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

3 That would be it .	So that would be a grande salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 Can I get a salted caramel mocha ?	Which size ?
2 Tall would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 That would be it .	So that would be a tall salted caramel mocha . Is that right ?
4 Yeah .	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 I want a lemonade , please .	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Could I get a fruit mix ?	So that would be a grande lemonade and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
4 No , a bottle of water .	Sure ! So that would be a grande bottle of water and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
5 Actually , I would like an orange juice instead .	Sure ! So that would be a grande orange juice and a fruit mix . Is that right ?
6 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

5 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

2 Grande , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 No , thanks .	So that would be a grande iced cordusio . Is that right ?
4 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

4 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .

1 A pumpkin spice latte .	Which size ?
2 Grande would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
3 Just the drink .	So that would be a grande pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
4 Actually , I would like short instead .	Sure ! So that would be a short pumpkin spice latte . Is that right ?
5 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter .
